title: LD Score Regression in R
text: goal ldscR provide functionality perform heritability estimation using LD score regression within R.

title: LD Score Regression in R
text: can install development version ldscR GitHub :

title: LD Score Regression in R
text: ldsc_h2() can used estimate heritability. Sample GWAS data provided sumstats_munged_example(). Users can utilize built-LD reference data, provide .
code: library(ldscR) df <- sumstats_munged_example() ldsc_h2(munged_sumstats = df, ancestry = "EUR")

what: Convert Heritability to Liability Scale — h2_liability
title: Convert Heritability to Liability Scale — h2_liability
text: h2_liability() converts heritability estimates observed liability scale.

title: Convert Heritability to Liability Scale — h2_liability
Convert Heritability to Liability Scale — h2_liability
text: h2 (numeric) Estimate observed-scale heritability sample_prev (numeric) Proportion cases current sample population_prev (numeric) Population prevalence trait

title: Convert Heritability to Liability Scale — h2_liability
text: list containing liability-scale heritability, standard error, p-value

title: Convert Heritability to Liability Scale — h2_liability

title: ldscR: LD Score Regression in R — ldscR-package

title: Estimate heritability — ldsc_h2
text: ldsc_h2() uses ldscore regression estimate heritability trait GWAS summary statistics reference LD information.

title: Estimate heritability — ldsc_h2
code: ldsc_h2(   munged_sumstats,   ancestry,   sample_prev = NA,   population_prev = NA,   ld,   wld,   n_blocks = 200,   chisq_max = NA )

title: Estimate heritability — ldsc_h2
text: munged_sumstats Either dataframe, path file containing munged summary statistics. Must contain least columns named SNP (rsid), A1 (effect allele), A2 (non-effect allele), N (total sample size) Z (Z-score) ancestry (character) One AFR, AMR, CSA, EAS, EUR, MID, utilize appropriate built-ld wld files Pan-UK Biobank. empty NULL, user must specify paths ld wld files. sample_prev (numeric) binary traits, prevalence cases current sample, used conversion observed heritability liability-scale heritability. default NA, appropriate quantitative traits estimating heritability observed scale. population_prev (numeric) binary traits, population prevalence trait, used conversion observed heritability liability-scale heritability. default NA, appropriate quantitative traits estimating heritability observed scale. ld (character) Path directory containing ld score files, ending *.l2.ldscore.gz. Default NA, utilize built-ld score files Pan-UK Biobank ancestry specified ancestry. wld (character) Path directory containing weight files. Default NA, utilize built-weight files Pan-UK Biobank ancestry specified ancestry. n_blocks (numeric) Number blocks used produce block jackknife standard errors. Default 200 chisq_max (numeric) Maximum value Z^2 SNPs included LD-score regression. Default set chisq_max maximum 80 N*0.001.

title: Estimate heritability — ldsc_h2
text: tibble containing heritability information. sample_prev population_prev provided, heritability estimate also returned liability scale.
